name: mediawin
description: The DeskThing Media Windows App is a local audio control control source for the DeskThing

scripts.build: del /F /Q builds latest\GWP.zip 2>nul && npm run build_package && cd builds && ..\..\7z\7z.exe a ../latest/GWP.zip * && cd ..
scripts.postversion: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const manifest = require('./public/manifest.json'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); if (manifest.version !== pkg.version) { manifest.version = 'v' + pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync('./public/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2), 'utf8'); console.log('Updated manifest version to ' + pkg.version); }" && npm install
